price: 32. Waa intaasoo Rabbigeen noogu beddelo beer ka wanaagsan, Isagaan innagu khayr ka rajeyne.
arabic: عَسَىٰ رَبُّنَآ أَن يُبۡدِلَنَا خَيۡرٗا مِّنۡهَآ إِنَّآ إِلَىٰ رَبِّنَا رَٰغِبُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: ʿasā rabbunā an yub'dilanā khayran min'hā innā ilā rabbinā rāghibūna
